name: Make cringe on the Backrooms Wiki tycoon
name_original: Make cringe on the Backrooms Wiki tycoon
description:
Most of the game is easy to understand but some stuff needs explaining.

Click the settings button to open the settings.

Hold your mouse over the shop button to open it, once you dont have your mouse hovering over the shop, any of the shopping buttons or the maroon drop down part.

Click anywhere on the mouse, the left and right buttons do the same.
